from batchq.pipelines.shell.ssh import BaseSecureTerminal


[docs]class SFTPTerminal(BaseSecureTerminal):

    def __init__(self, server, username, password, port = 22, accept_figerprint = False):
        super(SFTPTerminal,self).__init__(server, username, password, port, accept_figerprint, "sftp", "-oPort=%d", "sftp>")


[docs]    def initiate_pipe(self):
        pass



[docs]    def chdir(self, path):
        res = self.send_command("cd '%s'" % path) 
#        print "GOT: ", res, res.strip() == ""
        return res.strip() == ""




[docs]    def local_chdir(self, path):
        res = self.send_command("lcd '%s'" % path)
#        print "GOT: ", res, res.strip() == ""
        return res.strip() == ""



[docs]    def pwd(self):
        res = self.send_command("pwd").split(": ",1)
        return res[1].strip()



[docs]    def local_pwd(self):
        res = self.send_command("lpwd").split(": ",1)
        return res[1].strip()




[docs]    def sendfile(self, local_file, remote_file):
        res = self.send_command("put '%s' '%s'" % (local_file, remote_file))        
        if "No such file or directory" in res:
            return False
        return True



[docs]    def getfile(self, local_file, remote_file):
        res = self.send_command("get '%s' '%s'" % (remote_file, local_file))        
        if "No such file or directory" in res:
            return False
        return True
